greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: List points (x,y) having integer coordinates with x >= y >= 0, sorted first by x^2+y^2 and in case of a tie, by x-coordinate. Sequence gives x-coordinates.
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: for i from 0 to M do
for j from 0 to i do
xref: For the y coordinates see A283304.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 04 2017, following a suggestion from _Ahmet Arduç_.
